entry.title: WIND WARNING , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 06:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: SE 25 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Rainfall amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 late this morning then becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
